resources:
MapOut Questions
What is the capital of Malaysia? Which ocean borders the western coast of the United States? What is the tallest mountain in the world? How many continents are there in the world? Which is larger, a lake or a sea?
What is the capital of Malaysia?
Shah Alam Kuala Lumpur (correct) Brunei Bangkok
Which ocean borders the western coast of the United States?
Atlantic Ocean Indian Ocean Pacific Ocean (correct) Arctic Ocean
What is the tallest mountain in the world?
Mount Kilimanjaro K2 Mount Everest (correct) Mount Fuji
How many continents are there in the world?
Five Six Seven (correct) Eight
Which is larger, a lake or a sea?
A lake is larger than a sea. They are the same size. It depends on the lake and sea. A sea is larger than a lake (correct).
